title: Bug 19089: No popup menu in Java editor ruler (Photon)
description: When right-clicking on the left vertical ruler in a Java editor in Photon version, the expected behavior is to display a menu with options to add breakpoints or marks. However, this menu is not being displayed.
OB: No popup menu is displayed when right-clicking on the left vertical ruler in a Java editor in Photon version.
EB: The expected behavior is to display a menu with options to add breakpoints or marks when right-clicking on the left vertical ruler in a Java editor in Photon version.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1) Open a Java editor. 2) Right-click on the left vertical ruler.
